content: Much of this is through our relentless efforts to optimize our core industrial group's operation, which will further solidify  we are having a very good year, and given the growth demand for clean energy sources, we feel our market position as a leading provider of virtual natural gas pipelines through the last mile across the U.S. Our expansionary efforts in new and exciting sectors, our ability to export LNG abroad, and our growing efforts to introduce additional clean fuels to our customer base all afford us numerous levers in order to drive tremendous franchise value.
